## Step 1: Load packages (Skipped)
```{r}
packageVersion("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

## Step 2: Create data frame
```{r}
#raw data
names <- c("John", "Shemken", "Pig pig", "Nik nik")
age <- c(3,4,5,6)

#dataframe
people <- data.frame(names,age)
```

## Step 3: inspect the data frame
```{r}
head(people)
str(people)
glimpse(people)
colnames(people)
mutate(people, age_in_20 = age + 20)
```

## Step 4: Try it yourself
```{r}
fruits <- c("banana", "apple", "avocado", "orange", "mango")
fruit_rank <- c("3", "4", "2", "5", "1")
fruit_ranks <- data.frame(fruits, fruit_rank);
head(fruit_ranks)
glimpse(fruit_ranks)
mutate(fruit_ranks, percentage = mean(fruit_rank))
```
